entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 19 except 12 near Lake Superior. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High 19 except 12 near Lake Superior. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
